original_title: Frank Maselskis: From WWII POW to Chosin Reservoir Survivor
overview: Frank Maselskis was a prisoner of war in World War II. Despite the horrible experiences of being a prisoner Frank decides to join in the Korean War, where he participates in the battle of Chosin, a brutal combat that took place in the most extreme weather conditions.
tagline: From Hell Ship to the Chosin River, one Marine made Semper Fidelis more than a motto; it was a personal code.
title: Frank Maselskis: From WWII POW to Chosin Reservoir Survivor
